fields.name: AuthSetupCompleteText
fields.fieldText:
Authenticator App Verification Enabled


Authenticator App verification has been enabled for your account.


On your next login, you may be prompted to set up your Authenticator App (such as Google Authenticator or Salesforce Authenticator).


If you are not prompted, please contact your administrator to complete the setup.

fields.name: EmailLoginInfoText
fields.fieldText:
Identity Verification


{!emailSendMessage}


Enter the 6-digit verification code to continue to your portal.

fields.name: EmailLoginErrorText
fields.fieldText: {!loginCodeMessage}

fields.name: EmailLoginCodeInput
fields.fieldText: Verification Code

fields.name: EmailLoginDivider
fields.fieldText: Want to use a different verification method? Select an option below instead of entering a code.

fields.name: SwitchToSMS
fields.fieldText: Switch to SMS Verification

fields.name: SwitchToMFAFromEmail
fields.fieldText: Switch to Authenticator App (MFA)

fields.name: EmailSetupCompleteText
fields.fieldText:
Email Verification Enabled!


Your email has been verified and email verification is now enabled for your account.


From now on, you will receive a verification code via email each time you log in.


You can switch to SMS or Authenticator App verification at any time during login.

fields.name: EmailSetupInfoText
fields.fieldText:
Verify Your Email Address


{!emailSendMessage}


Enter the 6-digit code below to verify your email.

fields.name: EmailSetupErrorText
fields.fieldText: {!emailCodeMessage}

fields.name: EmailSetupCodeInput
fields.fieldText: Verification Code

fields.name: EmailSetupHelpText
fields.fieldText: The code expires in 10 minutes. If you did not receive the code, go back and try again.

fields.name: ErrorText
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong


An error occurred during the verification process. Please try logging in again.


Error: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: SelectMethodInfoText
fields.fieldText:
Set Up Account Verification


To protect your account, please select a verification method. You will use this method to verify your identity each time you log in.

fields.name: SelectedMethod
fields.fieldText: Choose Verification Method

fields.name: SMSSetupInfoText
fields.fieldText:
Verify Your Phone Number


{!sendCodeMessage}


Enter the 6-digit code below to verify your phone number.

fields.name: SMSSetupErrorText
fields.fieldText: {!codeMessage}

fields.name: SMSSetupCodeInput
fields.fieldText: Verification Code

fields.name: SMSSetupHelpText
fields.fieldText: The code expires in 10 minutes. If you did not receive the code, go back and try again.

fields.name: SMSLoginInfoText
fields.fieldText:
Identity Verification


{!loginSendMessage}


Enter the 6-digit verification code to continue to your portal.

fields.name: SMSLoginErrorText
fields.fieldText: {!loginCodeMessage}

fields.name: SMSLoginCodeInput
fields.fieldText: Verification Code

fields.name: SMSLoginDivider
fields.fieldText: Want to use Authenticator App instead? Check the box below and verify your SMS code to switch.

fields.name: SwitchToMFA
fields.fieldText: Switch to Authenticator App (MFA)

fields.name: SMSPhoneInfoText
fields.fieldText:
Set Up SMS Verification


Enter your mobile phone number below. We will send a verification code to this number.

fields.name: PhoneNumberInput
fields.fieldText: Mobile Phone Number

fields.name: SMSSetupCompleteText
fields.fieldText:
SMS Verification Enabled!


Your phone number has been verified and SMS verification is now enabled for your account.


From now on, you will receive a verification code via SMS each time you log in.


You can switch to Authenticator App verification at any time during login.

fields.name: SwitchMFACompleteText
fields.fieldText:
Switched to Authenticator App!


Your verification method has been changed to Authenticator App.


On your next login, you may be prompted to set up your Authenticator App (such as Google Authenticator or Salesforce Authenticator).


If you are not prompted, please contact your administrator to complete the setup.
